statements: UPDATE suppliers SET supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers', contact_person = 'John Doe' WHERE supplier_id = 1;

UPDATE suppliers SET email_address = 'new_email@example.com', phone_number = '+123456789' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_person = 'John Doe', product_catalog = '{"category": "Electronics", "products": ["TV", "Laptop", "Smartphone"]}' WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_phone='123-456-7890', contact_email='newemail@example.com' WHERE supplier_name='ABC Corp';
UPDATE products SET price=15.99, stock_quantity=100 WHERE supplier_id=101;
